org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method.annotation

Class RequestBodyArgumentResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method.HandlerMethodArgumentResolverSupport
      • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method.annotation.AbstractMessageReaderArgumentResolver
        • org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method.annotation.RequestBodyArgumentResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HandlerMethodArgumentResolver

    public class RequestBodyArgumentResolver
extends AbstractMessageReaderArgumentResolver
    Resolves method arguments annotated with @RequestBody by reading the body of the request through a compatible HttpMessageReader.

    An @RequestBody method argument is also validated if it is annotated with @javax.validation.Valid or Validated. Validation failure results in an ServerWebInputException.

    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Sebastien Deleuze, Stephane Maldini, Rossen Stoyanchev
